What is the final conclusion of this issue?

You can pay attention to this issue. We will support configuring multiple different WeChat alert plugin instances in this feature. By associating alertplugininstance-alertgroup-workflow, you can achieve your needs.

I think this is just a fix for #3616 .  It seems good.
For #3616 , it looks a simple issue, but involves that Master must have the ability to ping the worker as the task times-out.
+1，review it later

+1，it may need the communication between api server and worker or master， or it can use DB, zk to implement.

If anyone has any idea about this feature, welcome to leave a message.

If anyone is interested in this
feature, welcome to leave a message.
Easy to implement， anyone who are interested in this feature, welcome to leave a message.
+1，any design doc about this feature? It maybe need dynamic load class, if there is design doc, it will be better.

@feiyalun Hi,Whether the question you said above resolved,I tested on the 1.3.2 branch and it is successful.
The python scirpt is the following. 
And please use in english,thx.
```
import os
return_code=os.system('cd /usr/local')
print 'return_code=',return_code
if return_code!=0: exit(1)#异常退出
```

配置问题. 
如果单纯做上传|下载操作的话，你需要检查两个配置：
1，master端 是否已放置core-site.xml, hdfs-site.xml两个配置文件
2.   master端 检查common.properties文件的下方配置，指定HDFS
# resource upload startup type : HDFS,S3,NONE
resource.storage.type=HDFS

1. first, run workflow A , workflow instance A is in execution, stop master service
2. Restart the master service , after successful execution of workflow instance A, delete workflow instance A 

3. second, run workflow A again, workflow instance B is in execution, stop master service
4. Restart the master service, the master service has been receiving the success message of deleted task 90, as shown in the figure below,  taskInstanceId=90 is the task of workflow instance A
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55787491/93456858-d36ab480-f910-11ea-8c4f-9063f7bdd966.png)

I saw your configuration `fs.defaultFS=hdfs://192.168.201.83:8020`,If you expect to use the hadoop ha,please change this.You can check the value of `fs.defaultFS` in the core-site .xml and hdfs-site.xml

The problem only exists in version 1.3.2，There are 2 solutions to this problem:
Method 1: Delete the resource id that does not exist in the resourceList in the database t_ds_process_definition.process_definition_json
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55787491/93562738-36178b00-f9b9-11ea-9679-df96393c390e.png)
Method 2: According to the pr above, change the front-end source code and recompile, replace the ui in the installation directory with the compiled ui

when i use mysql 5.6 ,its the problem i have encounterd,you can upgrade mysql to 5.7 or set system global variables 'innodb_large_prefix' on,and SET GLOBAL innodb_file_format=Barracuda; SET GLOBAL innodb_file_format_max=Barracuda,and you should restart mysql to make it ! i choose upgrade mysql to solve this problem!

i have same problem when i login in with admin,when i first create tenant ,it makes me confusion you will to verify-tenant-code,but i create tenant with code now,its a problem like The chicken came first, or the egg, so please check its is a problem or tenant should be created in database on myself,wait for you response, TKS!
